column4: hi people, my ubuntu crash with this message in all terminal "jayson-desktop kernel: [ 7362.919269]  general protection fault: 0000 [1]  SMP", what is this ?
have you checked your hardware, or made sure your hardware is compatible with the kernel you are running
when i running 32bit application aways my kernel crash, my kernel is "Linux jayson-desktop 2.6.20-15-generic #2 SMP Sun Apr 15 06:17:24 UTC 2007 x86_64 GNU/Linux"
I use libs32 to run wine, and the kernel crash, or program reset
For example my tibia crash with this message "XIO:  fatal IO error 104 (Connection reset by peer) on X server :0.0 after 21044 requests (21043 known processed) with 0 events remaining."
This message appers too in x64 apps
thats a different error to you kernel panic
he's just shown you the link - you don't need to do it again
Maybe the error 104 in X, can be becouse NVidia 64 ?
